thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1742
thread.title: jetsetter

author: jetsetter
title: jetsetter
text: Flighthub is a site I compare to regularly and I found that flightub and cheapoair have the exact prices so I alternate my bookings with both companies. this time after my payment was made I noticed the price I paid was almost $100 more, I called them right away and they said I selected insurance and that was the addional fee, I wish they didn't have YES automatically. Another feature I would like to see is price protection so if the price drops within a certain time we would get credit for it
